definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(old) jade tablet (a ceremonial badge of rank)

sentences.english: Semiconductor silicon is the most fundamental material for the microelectronic industry.
sentences.chinese: 半导体硅材料是微电子产业的基础材料。

sentences.english: Stationary anode, single focus, and bridge silicon rectification, The X-ray generator is an oil-immersed self-cooled unit.
sentences.chinese: 固定阳极，单焦点，桥式硅整流，油浸自冷组合式。

sentences.english: Microporous Si-Ti pillared montmorillonite materials were prepared in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 合成了一种硅钛柱撑蒙脱土微孔材料。

sentences.english: The calcines of siliceous zinc sulfide concentrates were treated hydrometallurgically.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高硅硫化锌精矿焙烧料的湿法处理。

sentences.english: Let’s take a look at a few of the non-electronic predecessors to today’s silicon circuits.
sentences.chinese: 让我们来看看今天硅电路的非电子前辈。

sentences.english: He says it will have a high melting point.
sentences.chinese: 他认为硅的熔点非常高。

sentences.english: This makes dye-based cells more flexible than silicon ones.
sentences.chinese: 这个特性使染料电池比硅光电池更加灵活。

sentences.english: It's another manufactured marvel of silicon and plastic.
sentences.chinese: 它是另一个硅和塑料的工程奇迹。

sentences.english: Bars and rods, for welding electrodes, hot-rolled, in irregularly wound coils, of silicomanganese steel.
sentences.chinese: 热轧硅锰钢条及杆，焊接电极用，绕成不规则卷盘状。

sentences.english: This is partly due to the prevalence of siliceous fillers in composite materials.
sentences.chinese: 其原因部分是由于含硅填料在复合材料中用得最多。

sentences.english: The magnetic properties and the domain refining effect of laser grooving are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究取向硅钢板磁性及激光刻痕细化磁畴的效果。

sentences.english: It introduces a few methods of silicomanganese with high-silicon in production practice.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了生产高硅锰硅合金的几种方法。

sentences.chinese: 介绍了生产高硅锰硅合金的几种方法。

sentences.english: These other transistors are made with what is called amorphous silicon.
sentences.chinese: 这种半导体管是由称为非晶体硅的材料制成。

sentences.english: Diffused junction type silicon diode, 1,0A ultrahigh-speed rectifier.
sentences.chinese: 扩散结型硅二极管，1，0一个超高速整流器。

sentences.english: It’s cheaper to make “thin-film solar cells” with cadmium telluride than with silicon.
sentences.chinese: 用碲化镉制作薄膜太阳能电池比硅更便宜。
